about_the_game:
Souls Survivors—is a dynamic roguelite where you'll encounter endless hordes of enemies, unique boss battles, diverse characters, and the secrets of a dying universe.

Explore vast levels, master new skills, and create unique combat combinations to save this world from destruction.

Game Features:


  • Endless Battles: Fight thousands of enemies - from trolls and skeletons to demons and robots - in each new run.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Defeat powerful bosses and unlock them as playable characters.
  • Mysterious World:Explore the ruins of ancient civilizations, find legendary artifacts, and uncover the secrets of the dying universe.
  • Infinite Variety: Choose from hundreds of skills, combine them with unique hero abilities, and create unique builds in each run.
  • Multi-faceted Characters: Discover new heroes and their alternative versions from other realities, each with their own unique playstyle.
  • Challenging Trials: Take on special achievements and prove your mastery.

Souls Survivors is easy to learn but deep game that will captivate you from the first minutes. Embark on an adventure to save the world and become a legend!

About Us

We are a small independent team consisting of 3 developers. Our team wants to work only on games that we enjoy.

We would like to express our sincere gratitude to each of you for your interest and active participation. We are deeply grateful for your support. Your assistance means a lot to us!

If you are interested in our game, adding it to your wishlist would be a huge support for us!

name: Souls Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Souls Survivors is a dynamic roguelite where you'll encounter endless hordes of enemies, unique boss battles, diverse characters, and the secrets of a dying universe. Explore vast levels, master new skills, and create unique combat combinations to save this world from destruction.
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Ukrainian, Japanese
